Warrior

You got by as a relentless combatant. Whether you were a mercenary, gladiator, bandit, or other kind of fighter, you often found yourself battling for survival. At the end of the day, only your body and your weapon could truly be trusted to see you through a fight.

Ability Score Increase. Your Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution increases by 1. Your Strength, Dexterity, or Charisma increases by 1.

Merciless Attacks. When you score a critical hit with a weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon’s damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.VWPUNI5VXUZC19KU]{Merciless Attacks}

Skills. Choose one from: Acrobatics, Athletics, Insight, Intimidation, Performance.

Tools. Proficiency with a gaming set or vehicles(land).

Languages. One of your choice.

Other. Proficiency with a weapon or an extra language.
